Package Program4GUI

Class SelectionPageController

java.lang.Object
Program4GUI.SelectionPageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SelectionPageController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the main page where customer will create pizza order.
Author:
Rizwan Chowdhury, Tin Fung

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resource)
      Sets initial values for elements in the gui when the gui starts.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - url of relative path resources
      resource - resources used

    • setUpComboBoxes

      private void setUpComboBoxes()
      Helper method to set up combobox elements for pizza style and size. Will be called by initialize.

    • setDefaultVals

      private void setDefaultVals()
      Sets default values for various elements in the gui after certain commands/actions or when the gui first starts.

    • setUpToppingOptionLists

      private void setUpToppingOptionLists()
      Helper method to set up the initial state and functionalities of the toppingOptionsListBox and availableToppings list. Will be called by initialize.

    • setUpToppingSelectedLists

      private void setUpToppingSelectedLists()
      Helper method to set up the initial state and functionalities of the toppingSelectedListBox and selectedToppings list. Will be called by initialize.

    • clearSelectedToppings

      private void clearSelectedToppings()
      When called will remove all items from the selected toppings list.

    • addSelectedToppings

      public void addSelectedToppings​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Will be called when Add Toppings>> button is pressed. Will take the slected items in the available toppings listview and add them to the selected toppings list. Since two of the same topping not allowed checks will be made to make sure this does not happen.
      Parameters:
      e - The Add Toppings>> being pressed.

    • atMaxLimitTopping

      private boolean atMaxLimitTopping()
      Checks to see if the maximum number of toppings is exceeded or not in the selected toppings list
      Returns:
      true if max number exceeded, false otherwise

    • alreadyContainsTopping

      private boolean alreadyContainsTopping​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> toppingsBuffer)
      Helper method to check if element being added already exists in selected Topping list.
      Parameters:
      toppingsBuffer - list of toppings that are to be added to the selected list
      Returns:
      true if there is an element that exists in both lists, false otherwise

    • removeSelectedToppings

      public void removeSelectedToppings​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Activated when user presses the Remove Toppings button. It removes selected toppings from the selectedToppings list.
      Parameters:
      e - pressing of the Remove Toppings button

    • readjustToppings

      public void readjustToppings​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      When Hawaiian or Deluxe is selected as pizza style the toppings section will be locked, since for Hawaiian and Deluxe customers cannot choose their own toppings. Will also clear the selected toppings list when switching to Hawaiian or Deluxe.
      Parameters:
      e - Selection of a style in the Pizza Style combo box.

    • setPresetToppings

      private void setPresetToppings​(java.lang.String style)
      Helper method to set preset toppings to selected toppings list for Hawaiian and Deluxe pizza
      Parameters:
      style - Hawaiian or Deluxe, the style for which preset toppings are to be set

    • resetToppingSelection

      private void resetToppingSelection()
      Resets the selected topping selection and available toppings selection after each time a toppings command is pressed or after selection cleared or something.

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Once the Add Order button is pressed the current order, as it is (barring errors in order), will be added to current list of orders for customers.
      Parameters:
      e - Pressing of Add Order button

    • addBuildYourOwn

      private void addBuildYourOwn​(java.lang.String style, java.lang.String size)
      Helper method to create and add a Build Your Own pizza to the current orders.
      Parameters:
      style - Build Your Own; used for object creation purposes
      size - how big the pie is: small, medium, large

    • addDeluxe

      private void addDeluxe​(java.lang.String style, java.lang.String size)
      Helper method to create and add a Deluxe pizza object to the current orders
      Parameters:
      style - Deluxe, here for object creation purposes
      size - how big the pie is: small, medium, large

    • addHawaiian

      private void addHawaiian​(java.lang.String style, java.lang.String size)
      Helper method to create and add a Hawaiian pizza object to the current orders
      Parameters:
      style - Hawaiian, here for object creation purposes
      size - how big the pie is: small, medium, large

    • clearSelection

      public void clearSelection​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      When clear selection button is pressed the current selection will be cleared and re-set to defaults
      Parameters:
      e - Clear Selection button being pressed

    • viewOrders

      public void viewOrders​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Triggered with the press of hte View Orders button, will open the Orders screen and pass list of current orders to the new window.
      Parameters:
      e - Pressing of the View Order button

    • doneAction

      public void doneAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Pressing of the Done button will close the entire program
      Parameters:
      e - Pressing of the done button, will also contain info on the done button
